pkgmetadata.longdescription: 'Rcpp' Integration for the 'MLPACK' Library // 'MLPACK' is an intuitive, fast, scalable C++ machine learning library, meant to be a machine learning analog to 'LAPACK'. It aims to implement a wide array of machine learning methods and function as a Swiss army knife for machine learning researchers: 'MLPACK' is available from http://www.mlpack.org/; sources are included in the package.
